page.title: 12FISHING CENSUS ON THE NENE 1
page.content:
JULY 1985
We arrived in Wadenhoe after an exhausting bike ride. After a brief rest we set up our tackle and began to fish. We waited and waited, and waited a little longer, until at last we got lucky and had a bite (hooray!).The first fish we caught was a 3lb 2oz bream. This inspired us to continue. Luck seemed on our side as the fish continued to bite, after the first bream came roach, carp, dace, gudgeon and another bream. After carefully placing the fish back into the river we packed up our tackle and wrote up our notes. Finally we cycled home feeling much the worse for wear.
